## ğŸ”§ SPARQL Verification Queries

Since no entities were found in Wikidata, here are template queries to verify future entries:

### Organization Verification Query
```sparql
# Query to verify Curiouser.ai entry (when created)
SELECT ?item ?itemLabel ?website ?industry WHERE {
  ?item wdt:P31 wd:Q4830453 .  # instance of organization
  ?item rdfs:label "Curiouser.ai"@en .
  OPTIONAL { ?item wdt:P856 ?website }
  OPTIONAL { ?item wdt:P452 ?industry }
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }
}
```

### AI Companies Query (for context)
```sparql
# Find similar AI companies for benchmarking
SELECT ?company ?companyLabel ?website WHERE {
  ?company wdt:P31/wdt:P279* wd:Q4830453 .  # organization
  ?company wdt:P452 wd:Q11660 .             # artificial intelligence industry
  ?company wdt:P856 ?website .
  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "en" }
}
LIMIT 10
```
